channel.title: Highscores Problem! (deathchaos you CAN help you did it before :p)
channel.description: Okay i recently reset my highscores.....but now whenever a player logs out it fills it with errors....my com folder is with the .class files...help???? :)

item.source: Highscores Problem! (deathchaos you CAN help you did it before :p)

item.title: Highscores Problem! (deathchaos you CAN help you did it before :p)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

It’s not connecting to the database, and there are a ton of different possibilities.

  1. Password is wrong in SQL class
  2. IP is wrong in SQL class
  3. Database isn’t set up
  4. Com folder isn’t in the right place
  5. Com folder is in the right place but Driver class isn’t in the folder due to an extracting error
  6. MySQL service isn’t running

Read full topic
item.source: Highscores Problem! (deathchaos you CAN help you did it before :p)

item.dc:creator: @system system
